leads.lead_text: Cypselas mostly 6–11 mm long, with beak 2–7 mm long; involucre slender, usually 3–8 mm diam.; involucral bracts with 1–3 lines of hairs; low altitudes
Cypselas mostly 4.5–6 mm long, with beak 0.4–1 mm long; involucre stout, usually 5–10 mm diam.; involucral bracts with 0–2 lines of hairs; subalpine to alpine
